alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 30 at 11:23AM PST until January 30 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
